医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州的儿科 COVID-19 疫苗接种计划是否减少了报告病例和住院人数？严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 发病率和相关住院治疗的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Did-Californias-pediatric-COVID-19-vaccination-program-reduce-reported-cases-and-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Did-Californias-pediatric-COVID-19-vaccination-program-reduce-reported-cases-and-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbb16d7a-bf6a-4e47-87fd-dfe2f777c290 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 05:59:00 -0400 Did California's pediatric COVID-19 vaccination program reduce reported cases and hospitalizations?
父母的精神疾病与后代患自闭症谱系障碍的风险有关吗？父母的精神疾病与后代患自闭症谱系障碍的风险之间的潜在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Are-parental-psychiatric-disorders-lated-to-the-risk-of-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-the-offspring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Are-parental-psychiatric-disorders-lated-to-the-risk-of-autism-spectrum-disorder-in-the-offspring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d9373a-1e7e-4f39-bbb4-6018dc635388 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 05:31:00 -0400 Are parental psychiatric disorders related to the risk of autism spectrum disorder in the offspring?
探索生酮饮食在治疗癫痫方面的潜力生酮饮食（KD）变化对癫痫患者的作用机制、功效和副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Exploring-the-pottial-of-ketogenic-diets-in-managing-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Exploring-the-pottial-of-ketogenic-diets-in-managing-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=347e2bfb-0f05-4efe-9f9b-9eef259f1a24 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 05:03:00 -0400 Exploring the potential of ketogenic diets in managing epilepsy
获得并维持 ISO 27001 和 BS 10012 认证在本次采访中，华大基因质量管理部总监付伟博士与 AZoMedical 谈论了如何获得和维持 ISO 27001 和 BS 10012 认证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Acheering-and-maintaining-ISO-27001-and-BS-10012-certifications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Acheering-and-maintaining-ISO-27001-and-BS-10012-certifications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4671cbee-9455-42b6-98e8-da962417cd20 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 04:39:00 -0400 Achieving and maintaining ISO 27001 and BS 10012 certifications
印度尼西亚研究发现水果和薄荷醇电子烟口味推动青少年使用寻求感觉的行为与电子烟（电子烟）使用之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Fruit-and-menthol-e-香烟-flavors-drive-use-among-teens-Indonesian-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Fruit-and-menthol-e-香烟-flavors-drive-use-among-teens-Indonesian-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aacdcc7-6ac4-4183-898f-6e9c7f02f1a5 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 04:16:00 -0400 Fruit and menthol e-cigarette flavors drive use among teens, Indonesian study finds
免疫细胞在高血压中发挥的作用比以前想象的更大，为新疗法打开了大门《Nature Reviews Nephrology》的一篇综述提出了免疫细胞与高血压发展之间的关联，提出了通过控制炎症来减轻疾病的潜在新治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Immune-cells-play-a-bigger-role-in-high-blood-Pressure-than-previously-thought-opening-doors-for-new-治疗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Immune-cells-play-a-bigger-role-in-high-blood-Pressure-than-previously-thought-opening-doors-for-new- Treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93424a1b-c537-417e-9a69-4c5031d6cfb5 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 00:34:00 -0400 Immune cells play a bigger role in high blood pressure than previously thought, opening doors for new treatments
肉桂、姜黄素和白藜芦醇有望对抗糖尿病炎症研究人员回顾了肉桂、姜黄素和白藜芦醇对 2 型糖尿病患者氧化应激和炎症的影响，强调了它们改善代谢调节和减少并发症的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Cinnamon-curcumin-and-resveratrol-show-promise-in-diabetes-inflammation-fight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Cinnamon-curcumin-and-resveratrol-show-promise-in-diabetes-inflammation-fight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ab55b72-4e20-498b-a6b7-a63d86aacea1 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 00:18:00 -0400 Cinnamon, curcumin, and resveratrol show promise in diabetes inflammation fight
医疗保健领域的人工智能在试验中显示出前景，但需要实际测试以确保有效性《柳叶刀数字健康》发表的一项综合研究分析了人工智能在临床环境中的功效和挑战，揭示了对现实世界测试和多样化研究方法的迫切需求，以确保人工智能可靠地融入医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/AI-in-healthcare-shows-promise-in-trials-but-needs-real-world-testing-to-ensure-efficientness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/AI-in-healthcare-shows-promise-in-trials-but-needs-real-world-testing-to-ensure- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4884a77-ec42-4879-a37e-02b55d1b1d1c Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:57:00 -0400 AI in healthcare shows promise in trials but needs real-world testing to ensure effectiveness
女性维生素 D 含量低与腹部脂肪和肌肉无力有关女性维生素 D 含量低与腹部脂肪较多和肌肉质量较低有关。该研究建议使用腰围与身高的比率和肌肉质量指数来评估健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Low-vitamin-D-tied-to-belly-fat-and-weak-muscles-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Low-vitamin-D-tied-to-belly-fat-and-weak-muscles-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d3fe54-b53c-4edd-ad6d-0d33f96ea847 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:38:00 -0400 Low vitamin D tied to belly fat and weak muscles in women
食品添加剂乳化剂与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关研究发现，食用某些食品乳化剂与 2 型糖尿病的较高风险之间存在联系。乳化剂在加工食品中很常见，可能会破坏肠道健康，可能导致糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Food-additive-emulsifiers-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Food-additive-emulsifiers-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04334158-9612-42b6-81df-c25323100380 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:19:00 -0400 Food additive emulsifiers linked to increased risk of type 2 diabetes
